sectionText: The course will examine the current state of global health informatics from both a local and global perspective, including opportunities and challenges. Focus will be placed on the transition from paper-based records to electronic systems, with a particular emphasis on large international open-source initiatives and use of mobile devices.  Guest speakers will share their experiences with WHO, international education based on mobile devices, and regulatory issues.  Meets with LIS 490 GHU, LIS 590 GHG and INFO 590 GHU.  This class will meet in 131 LIS Bldg.

meeting.buildingName: Grad Sch of Lib & Info Science
